name: sowl/laravel-doctrine-jsonapi
description: Package for the Laravel that allows developers to create JSON:API endpoints using the Doctrine ORM for data persistence.

test: docker compose run --rm -T -u $(id -u) php vendor/bin/phpstan analyze src
scripts.test:coverage: XDEBUG_MODE=coverage docker compose run --rm -T -u $(id -u) php vendor/bin/phpunit phpunit.xml --coverage-html /coverage
scripts.test:scribe:generate: docker compose run --rm -T -u $(id -u) php tests/artisan scribe:generate --no-upgrade-check --force
scripts.dev:migration:diff: docker compose run --rm -T -u $(id -u) php tests/artisan doctrine:migrations:diff --no-interaction
scripts.phpstan: docker compose run --rm -T -u $(id -u) php vendor/bin/phpstan analyze src
